ygData.subject: RE: Kith Nerfed!!!  Re: Undead drops in Kithicor
ygData.msgSnippet: Gahk!  Have you been in Kith since the patch???  They have totally NERFED it! It nearly completely light in there!  WTF? Man I needed some spell to cloud my
ygData.messageBody:
Gahk! Have you been in Kith since the patch??? They have totally NERFED
it!

It nearly completely light in there! WTF? Man I needed some spell to cloud
my vision! Granted I do got my clipping plane set to max viewing distance
but come on now - this is ridiculous!

Ugh - ugh - ugh what are they doing??

It used to be one of the most totally scary zones we had. Even if there
were no really bad mobs in there (after level 20/25 when ghouls go green) it
was still scary - dark, foggy, ucky noises and all.

Sylly Songsynger
<Spirit of the Moon>
Bard of the 35th song <yes still - hell hell hell>
somewhere on Innoruuk
